resources.string: Till did not registered? Join us with your PUCIT account SIGN UP
Learn more about why we ask for this information
Fill the following requirments to complete the Registration
We are requiring your email id during sigup so that only PUCITians can access this app
We are requiring your phone numbers so that during your academic year teacher can send his/her announcment directly to your number if you have no intenet connection for using social media websites
Other information are basic and neccessary during signup
